rendered: The OnePlus 5T is really a fantastic phone. The phone has a battery of 3,300 mAh. This phone's available colors are Black, Red and White. It has a display with a physical size of 6 inches and a screen-to-body ratio of 80.43 %.

OnePlus 5: a great phone! The phone has a battery of 3,300 mAh. This phone's available colors are Gold and Gray. It has a display with a screen-to-body ratio of 72.93 % and a physical size of 5.5 inches.

I really love the new OnePlus 3T. The phone's available tones are Black, Gold and Gray. This phone has a display with a physical size of 5.5 inches and a screen-to-body ratio of 73.15 % along with a battery of 3,400 mAh.
